title: Vampyr

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 560 Series (POLARIS11, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.9-zen1-1-zen, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: Performance is ~30fps with high settings, up to 45 - 60fps with lower settings. Crashes after 30 - 60mins. Sometimes (after loading something) goes back to windowed mode, but switching settings from full-screen to windowed and back to full-screen fixes it. Runs fine otherwise (X360 controller works fine as well).
